dublinCore.dc:title: 119 HR 1098 IH: To reauthorize the Junior Duck Stamp Conservation and Design Program Act of 1994.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Ms. Scholten (for herself and Mr. Yakym) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Natural Resources

form.official-title: To reauthorize the Junior Duck Stamp Conservation and Design Program Act of 1994.

section.header: Reauthorization of Junior Duck Stamp Conservation and Design Program Act of 1994

subsection.text: Section 5 of the Junior Duck Stamp Conservation and Design Program Act of 1994 (16 U.S.C. 719b–1) is amended—

paragraph.text: by inserting and after Guam,; and
by striking , and any other territory or possession after Virgin Islands.

subsection.text: Section 6 of the Junior Duck Stamp Conservation and Design Program Act of 1994 (16 U.S.C. 719c) is amended—

subparagraph.text: by striking 2006 through 2010 and inserting 2025 through 2031; and
in paragraph (1), by striking $100,000 and inserting $200,000; and
in paragraph (2), by striking $250,000 and inserting $350,000.
